summary: This is Tim Burton's Disney Channel Halloween film short that only aired once. It combines live action and stop-motion, making for a creepy adventure into the woods.
cast: Michael Yama|Andy Lee|Alison Hong|Jim Ishida|David Koenigsberg|Vincent Price
keywords: character names as title|hansel and gretel characters|three word title|gingerbread man|eating a furniture
title: Hansel and Gretel
